Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

entry.title: RadarScope
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2Ôºö$99.99 ‚Üí $14.99 [$14.99 ~ $99.99]

Application Description

RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities. Whether you‚Äôre scanning for a mesocyclone‚Äôs tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricane‚Äôs eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radar‚Äôs scanning strategy. Your initial app purchase includes the following: ‚Ä¢ Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany ‚Ä¢ 6-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ Two built-in providers for radar data ‚Ä¢ Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US ‚Ä¢ Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia ‚Ä¢ NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes ‚Ä¢ Inspector and distance tools ‚Ä¢ Color palette options for radar data ‚Ä¢ AllisonHouse data plan integration ‚Ä¢ Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting ‚Ä¢ mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL ‚Ä¢ Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use ‚Ä¢ Support for widgets and complications ‚Ä¢ Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV ‚Ä¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather: ‚Ä¢ 30-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes ‚Ä¢ Severe weather watches in the US and Canada ‚Ä¢ Special weather statements in the US and Canada ‚Ä¢ Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions ‚Ä¢ SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks ‚Ä¢ WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US ‚Ä¢ Local storm reports in the US ‚Ä¢ Custom color palette support ‚Ä¢ Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices) ‚Ä¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including: ‚Ä¢ Everything in Pro Tier One ‚Ä¢ 50-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ A third provider for US radar data ‚Ä¢ NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive ‚Ä¢ Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive ‚Ä¢ Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive ‚Ä¢ GOES East and GOES West satellite products ‚Ä¢ NSSL‚Äôs Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products ‚Ä¢ NCEP‚Äôs Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products ‚Ä¢ Surface observations ‚Ä¢ Atmospheric soundings in the US ‚Ä¢ Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive ‚Ä¢ More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps ‚Ä¢ Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA ‚Ä¢ Server-sent events for radar and warning updates ‚Ä¢ Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices ‚Ä¢ Family sharing support If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period. DTN is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Our privacy policy is available for review at https://www.dtn.com/privacy-policy/ Please visit our web site for more information.

entry.title: Audio Editor & Music Mixer
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Permanent membershipÔºö$11.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $14.99]

Application Description

Want to make your own unique phone ringtones? Or want to combine multiple songs and synthesize the music you want? Or want to know the effect of mixing different songs? Audio Editor & Music Mixer is an easy to operate music cutting and mixing tool. Simple and excellent, functional and practical! Whether you are a professional musician or music amateur, you can play easily. Features: 1.Professional ringtone clip: free to edit, the maximum clipping of the ringtone is 40s (in line with the characteristics of ringtones) 2.Simple music stitching: song editing and splicing as a whole,connect the favorite songs 3.Unique music mixing: free to cut the two songs, mixed together to play, feel different music effects! Subscription instrutionsÔºö - After you subscribe to the VIP, you have unlimited access to all features - Subscribe to provide 4 types of VIP services, including: weekly VIP service, monthly VIP service, yearly VIP service, permanent VIP service - Subscribe to $2.49 per week, $4.49 per month, $13.49 for 1 year and $14.99 for permanent - The purchase process is to deduct the purchase amount from the iTunes account - Account will be charged at the cost of the selected package within 24 hours prior to the current period - Cancellation of current subscription is not allowed during active subscription period.But you can cancel next subscription. - You can access our privacy policy by visiting (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/privacy_policy/musicmixer_en.html - You can access (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/service/musicmixer_en.html to read the Terms of Service *The price is equivalent to the 'Apple App Store Matrix' which is equivalent to the subscription price in US dollars.

entry.title: Wink: Video Enhancer & Editor
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Monthly Auto-renew VIPÔºö$12.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $12.99]

Application Description

Wink l Make any low-quality video & photo into HD/Ultra HD/4K with before/after comparisons. l Making video editing easier than ever! l Various creative video transition effects enhance final results! l Fine-tune your selfies with video retouch tools to highlight your day! Video ÔºÜ Photo Enhance - Video Enhancer: Enhance portraits and selfies to stunning output. - 4K Upscaler: AI-powered 4K upscaling for enhanced video quality. - Stabilize: Smooth out shaky footage for professional-looking videos. - Noise reduction: Reduce video noise and grain for professional-looking results. - AI Color: Give your video a vibrant, fresh look with our easy-to-use color enhancement tool Video Retouch - Manual Face Slimming: Adjust your facial features as you wish - Body Shape: Achieve a supermodel physique! - Stylish Makeup: Providing a range of natural makeup - Face Editor: Remove acne, Face Plump, Skin tone ... and more! - Whiten Teeth: Say goodbye to brown teeth and show off your smile! Video Editing - Professional Editing: Color, Crop, Speed, Split, Mirror, Soundtrack and more! - Templates: Easily apply to create high-quality vlogs - Quality Restoration: Clear AI-enhanced video restoration! - Effects: Adds texts, stickers, and transitions to enhance your videos - Automatic Subtitle: Utilizes intelligent voice recognition for easy text inputting AI Captions - Accurate AI subtitles for your videos in seconds - Support Bilingual: Create dual-language subtitles for your videos - Support 8 languages Wink VIP - Access exclusive VIP features Wink offers a wide range of exclusive VIP features to enhance retouching experience. We are committed to providing you with an improved service. We look forward to your continuing support. - Subscriptions Wink VIP-Monthly Subscription offers a subscription period of one month. Wink VIP-Annual subscription entails a 12-month period. *The subscription price is determined based on the information provided in the in-app purchase (iAP) application. - Instructions for Payment and Cancellation "Payment" will be credited to your iTunes account once you have confirmed and paid for your subscription. "Renewal" subscriptions for "Monthly/Annual" plans are automatically renewed and will incur charges to your iTunes account following your purchase confirmation. The subscription will be automatically renewed. To cancel it, please disable the automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the subscription period ends. Within 24 hours before the subscription cycle expires, Apple will automatically debit your iTunes account, extending your subscription for a new cycle. "To cancel your subscription, kindly navigate to the "Settings" section on your iPhone, click on "Apple ID," proceed to the "Subscription" screen, and choose "Wink" to terminate your subscription. - Agreement Terms of ServiceÔºöhttps://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/service-global.html?lang=en Privacy PolicyÔºöhttps://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/policy-global.html?lang=en

entry.title: Vythm VJ - Music Visualizer DJ
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • All features and modesÔºö$44.99 ‚Üí $29.99 [$29.99 ~ $44.99]

Application Description

--- Experience Your Music with Vythm --- Unlock the potential of music visualization with Vythm! Vythm is a versatile music visualization app that allows you to create visual artworks in harmony with your selected music. It includes a variety of unique visualization modes, including Equalizer, Mandala, Shapes, Fluids, Psychedelic, Dreaming, and more. Choose a background and apply image effects to personalize your visualization completely. --- Your Vision, Your Visualization --- Vythm provides you with numerous options to realize your creative vision: - Over 100 carefully selected backgrounds. - MIDI input for precise visual control. - NDI streaming support for sharing your creations. - Real-time image effects like color correction, bloom, chromatic aberration, and more. - Size, rotation, and orientation adjustments. And much more! The Equalizer, Rhythm, and Peer modes are available for free, while other modes can be unlocked through a subscription. --- Input Formats --- Select your music from a variety of sources: - Import any mp3 or m4a files. - Access your iTunes library (Please note that Apple Music is not currently supported). - Utilize your device's microphone, with sensitivity adjustments for various use cases. - Enjoy three preselected songs for quick inspiration. --- Record Your Masterpiece --- Vythm offers a recording feature that enables you to share or save your creations. Revisit your immersive visual world at your convenience or dazzle your audience with your artistic masterpiece. --- Share Your Thoughts --- Our top priority is to provide you with the best possible experience. If you encounter issues or have ideas for new features, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@mkgames.org. If you enjoy the app, we would greatly appreciate your feedback and a review! Thank you for choosing Vythm! Download and experience Vythm (Music Visualization 2024 / Audio Visualizer) today! Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Kingdom Rush Frontiers TD
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

In-App Purchases

  • BonehartÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $6.99]
  • AshbiteÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $6.99]
  • Sha'traÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]
  • GrawlÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]
  • DanteÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]

Application Description

Kingdom Rush Frontiers is a whole new level of the furiously fast, enchantingly charming gameplay that made kingdom Rush an award-winning Tower Defense hit. Defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your enemies to a pulp. BUILD MIGHTY TOWERS! ‚Ä¢ OVER 18 TOWER ABILITIES! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or assassins that steal and kill your enemies! ‚Ä¢ 8 SPECIALIZED TOWER UPGRADES! Slice, sizzle, and stomp your foes with Crossbow Forts, Mighty Templars, Necromancers, and even Earthquake Machines - hey, we told you we were shaking things up. ‚Ä¢ UPGRADE SYSTEM allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy. ‚Ä¢ Fortify the frontier in exotic news lands - hold the line in deserts, jungles, and even the underworld! TRAIN LEGENDARY HEROES ‚Ä¢ 16 LEGENDARY HEROES. Choose among mighty champions and train their abilities! Each has unique specialties that fit different play styles and strategies! ‚Ä¢ Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon! DEFEAT THEM ALL ‚Ä¢ OVER 40 ENEMIES with unique abilities! Stay on your toes as you fight through desert sandworms, tribal shamans, nomad tribes, and underground terrors. Action like you have never seen before! ‚Ä¢ MERCILESS BOSS FIGHTS! Hey, we told you to get those upgrades... MORE MIND-BOGGLING CONTENT ‚Ä¢ Hours of army with OVER 80 ACHIEVEMENTS! what can you expect from Ironhide Games, the creators of Kingdom rush? You will be hooked for hours searching for Easter eggs and achievements! ‚Ä¢ IN-GAME ENCYCLOPEDIA! learn all about your enemies and you will be able to plan the best strategy to defeat them. Study up! ‚Ä¢ CLASSIC, IRON, AND HEROIC GAME MODES to challenge your tactical skills! ‚Ä¢ 3 DIFFICULTY MODES! Are you up for a real challenge? Go with Hard mode! ‚Ä¢ PLAY IT OFFLINE! No internet? No problem! Application Description

Wink l Make any low-quality video & photo into HD/Ultra HD/4K with before/after comparisons. l Making video editing easier than ever! l Various creative video transition effects enhance final results! l Fine-tune your selfies with video retouch tools to highlight your day! Video ÔºÜ Photo Enhance - Video Enhancer: Enhance portraits and selfies to stunning output. - 4K Upscaler: AI-powered 4K upscaling for enhanced video quality. - Stabilize: Smooth out shaky footage for professional-looking videos. - Noise reduction: Reduce video noise and grain for professional-looking results. - AI Color: Give your video a vibrant, fresh look with our easy-to-use color enhancement tool Video Retouch - Manual Face Slimming: Adjust your facial features as you wish - Body Shape: Achieve a supermodel physique! - Stylish Makeup: Providing a range of natural makeup - Face Editor: Remove acne, Face Plump, Skin tone ... and more! - Whiten Teeth: Say goodbye to brown teeth and show off your smile! Video Editing - Professional Editing: Color, Crop, Speed, Split, Mirror, Soundtrack and more! - Templates: Easily apply to create high-quality vlogs - Quality Restoration: Clear AI-enhanced video restoration! - Effects: Adds texts, stickers, and transitions to enhance your videos - Automatic Subtitle: Utilizes intelligent voice recognition for easy text inputting AI Captions - Accurate AI subtitles for your videos in seconds - Support Bilingual: Create dual-language subtitles for your videos - Support 8 languages Wink VIP - Access exclusive VIP features Wink offers a wide range of exclusive VIP features to enhance retouching experience. We are committed to providing you with an improved service. We look forward to your continuing support. - Subscriptions Wink VIP-Monthly Subscription offers a subscription period of one month. Wink VIP-Annual subscription entails a 12-month period. *The subscription price is determined based on the information provided in the in-app purchase (iAP) application. - Instructions for Payment and Cancellation "Payment" will be credited to your iTunes account once you have confirmed and paid for your subscription. "Renewal" subscriptions for "Monthly/Annual" plans are automatically renewed and will incur charges to your iTunes account following your purchase confirmation. The subscription will be automatically renewed. To cancel it, please disable the automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the subscription period ends. Within 24 hours before the subscription cycle expires, Apple will automatically debit your iTunes account, extending your subscription for a new cycle. "To cancel your subscription, kindly navigate to the "Settings" section on your iPhone, click on "Apple ID," proceed to the "Subscription" screen, and choose "Wink" to terminate your subscription. - Agreement Terms of ServiceÔºöhttps://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/service-global.html?lang=en Privacy PolicyÔºöhttps://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/policy-global.html?lang=en

entry.title: RadarScope
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2Ôºö$99.99 ‚Üí $14.99 [$14.99 ~ $99.99]

Application Description

RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities. Whether you‚Äôre scanning for a mesocyclone‚Äôs tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricane‚Äôs eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radar‚Äôs scanning strategy. Your initial app purchase includes the following: ‚Ä¢ Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany ‚Ä¢ 6-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ Two built-in providers for radar data ‚Ä¢ Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US ‚Ä¢ Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia ‚Ä¢ NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes ‚Ä¢ Inspector and distance tools ‚Ä¢ Color palette options for radar data ‚Ä¢ AllisonHouse data plan integration ‚Ä¢ Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting ‚Ä¢ mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL ‚Ä¢ Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use ‚Ä¢ Support for widgets and complications ‚Ä¢ Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV ‚Ä¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather: ‚Ä¢ 30-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes ‚Ä¢ Severe weather watches in the US and Canada ‚Ä¢ Special weather statements in the US and Canada ‚Ä¢ Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions ‚Ä¢ SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks ‚Ä¢ WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US ‚Ä¢ Local storm reports in the US ‚Ä¢ Custom color palette support ‚Ä¢ Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices) ‚Ä¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including: ‚Ä¢ Everything in Pro Tier One ‚Ä¢ 50-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ A third provider for US radar data ‚Ä¢ NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive ‚Ä¢ Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive ‚Ä¢ Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive ‚Ä¢ GOES East and GOES West satellite products ‚Ä¢ NSSL‚Äôs Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products ‚Ä¢ NCEP‚Äôs Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products ‚Ä¢ Surface observations ‚Ä¢ Atmospheric soundings in the US ‚Ä¢ Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive ‚Ä¢ More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps ‚Ä¢ Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA ‚Ä¢ Server-sent events for radar and warning updates ‚Ä¢ Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices ‚Ä¢ Family sharing support If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period. DTN is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Our privacy policy is available for review at https://www.dtn.com/privacy-policy/ Please visit our web site for more information.
